definitions.usage: 指通过言行或情境使某人感到不自信、缺乏动力或不愿意继续做某事，常用于描述劝阻或消极影响。

examples.scene: 在学校里，一个学生想要参加数学竞赛，但老师觉得他准备不足，担心他会失败。
examples.chineseIdea: 老师希望学生不要因为失败而失去对数学的兴趣，所以建议他先多练习再参赛。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The teacher tried to @ @ @ entering the math competition until he was better prepared.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The teacher tried to 「discourage him from entering」 the math competition until he was better prepared.
examples.chineseTranslation: 老师试图「劝他不要参加」数学竞赛，直到他准备得更好。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Teacher suggest him not join competition.' 纠正：'The teacher discouraged him from joining the competition.'

examples.scene: 在公司会议上，管理层讨论是否投资一个新项目，但经济环境不稳定。
examples.chineseIdea: 管理层认为当前市场风险高，可能会让股东对投资新项目望而却步。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The unstable economy may @ @ in new projects.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The unstable economy may 「discourage investment」 in new projects.
examples.chineseTranslation: 不稳定的经济可能会「阻碍投资」新项目。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Economy makes investment not good.' 纠正：'The economy may discourage investment.'

definitions.usage: 指通过行动或措施减少某事发生的可能性，常用于描述防止不良行为或现象。

examples.scene: 在教室里，老师发现学生在考试中作弊，决定采取措施防止这种情况再次发生。
examples.chineseIdea: 老师希望通过严格的监考和惩罚措施来减少作弊行为。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The teacher implemented strict rules to @ @ @ during exams.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The teacher implemented strict rules to 「discourage cheating」 during exams.
examples.chineseTranslation: 老师实施了严格的规则以「防止作弊」在考试中发生。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Teacher stop students to cheat.' 纠正：'The teacher discouraged cheating by enforcing strict rules.'

examples.scene: 在一个社区中，居民投诉夜间噪音问题，当地政府决定采取行动。
examples.chineseIdea: 政府通过安装监控和加强巡逻来减少不良行为的发生。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The local government installed cameras to @ @ @ at night.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The local government installed cameras to 「discourage bad behavior」 at night.
examples.chineseTranslation: 当地政府安装了摄像头以「遏制不良行为」在夜间发生。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Government put cameras to stop bad things.' 纠正：'The government installed cameras to discourage bad behavior.'
